Contrast enhancement protocol.EditorialNote: Should really be importing the FlyBase biological imaging ontology, now that it is so mature.  Unfortunately, this is currently only available in OBO format.  It really needs to be incorporated directly or through import into OBI (BB:2006-10-10).
Contrast enhancement protocol.Comment: I would change the label of this class to "Contrast enhancement protocol" because these techniques can be used without microscopy
Contrast enhancement protocol.Definition: Protocol designed to add contrast to a biological organism or specimen for the purposes of imaging
